segments.text: Hi , may I speak to Ryan , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Ryan you are speaking with . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Ryan , this is Malia , and I will not be coming to work today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have really bad poison oak and can ’ t stop itching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you had it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve had it a few days , but the rash really got bad last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How have you been treating it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have some lotion that the doctor gave me , as well as an antihistamine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That should work . I ’ ll see you tomorrow when you return to work .
segments.speaker: S2
